about_the_game:
Deep in debt and desperate for freedom, you've taken a mining contract on a hostile frontier world. The company owns your life, but they don't own your ambition. Every mineral you extract brings you one step closer to buying back your freedom – assuming you survive the dangers that lurk below.

  • Transform raw resources into vital upgrades and establish outposts in the depths

  • Build a network of generators and mobile refineries to power your underground empire

  • Gather valuable resources to craft upgrades and outposts as you dig ever deeper!

  • Sell ores to unlock new blueprints or hire new crew members.

  • Learn to co-exist with the colossal creatures of the deep - or search for a way to exterminate them in their home.

  • Death isn't the end! Launch daring rescue missions to save trapped pilots, or salvage valuable equipment from the wreckage.
detailed_description:
Deep in debt and desperate for freedom, you've taken a mining contract on a hostile frontier world. The company owns your life, but they don't own your ambition. Every mineral you extract brings you one step closer to buying back your freedom – assuming you survive the dangers that lurk below.

  • Transform raw resources into vital upgrades and establish outposts in the depths

  • Build a network of generators and mobile refineries to power your underground empire

  • Gather valuable resources to craft upgrades and outposts as you dig ever deeper!

  • Sell ores to unlock new blueprints or hire new crew members.

  • Learn to co-exist with the colossal creatures of the deep - or search for a way to exterminate them in their home.

  • Death isn't the end! Launch daring rescue missions to save trapped pilots, or salvage valuable equipment from the wreckage.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Terminal Bore

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Explore the depths of a desolate planet as you search for rare ores. Upgrade your mining pod, build outposts, and max out your skill tree as you navigate the dangers that lurk below!
